pitchLab.modes.activeRelative
Class ActiveRelativeMethods

java.lang.Object
  pitchLab.modes.activeRelative.ActiveRelativeMethods

public class ActiveRelativeMethods
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines the Active Pitch methods used in PitchLab's Active Pitch mode

Version:
0.6 April 20, 2009
Author:
Gavin Shriver

Method Detail

blendNotes_arp

public static void blendNotes_arp(PianoWindow pw,
                                  int xPos,
                                  boolean firstTone)
Blends the notes together such that a smooth transition of notes is played as the user drags the bar accross the GUI piano window.

Parameters:
xPos - The x coordinate of the bar in the piano window
firstTone - The first random tone that will be played in the active relative test
pw - The GUI piano window
